main event: On March 22, 1953, two adults observed a silvery, round object traveling in a straight line at a constant speed and altitude.
interesting points: The observation lasted approximately 3 seconds,The object was reported to be in the vicinity of 20 degrees elevation,There were two confirmed witnesses,The object exhibited no sound during the observation,The report included detailed sketches and room measurements related to the observation.
witness description: two adult members of the population
